sections.content: Cross Country Ski Trail Conditions as of February 4, 2026 –

Bucks Run is groomed for skate and classic skiing. The connector trail between the ski center and Bucks Run is open. For your safety and the safety of our staff please adhere to Bucks Run hours.  Bucks Run is open Monday – Friday 12 pm – 7:45 pm and Saturday – Sunday 9 am – 7:45 pm, weather and conditions permitting.
Will be open February 7th & February 8th. Trails are groomed.

sections.header: Ski rentals are required to be purchased in advance online.
sections.content: Click here to rent ski equipment. If you’re having difficulty with our online rental process, click here for a quick reference guide on how to rent ski equipment online.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Classic skied bucks, coyote and cedar trace.  Bucks is in great condition for skate or classic.  A little soft today since they added snow.Coyote has grass and dirt in some tracks but can be avoided.  Cedar trace doesn't have tracks till you get out there.  But the loop is good.Thanks again evryone at HMNoteced most of the snow piles are gone.  Any chance one of the guns can be turned back on.  We usually get to ski till the first week of March.Thanks again.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Mother Nature’s snow - Nubs groom : it doesn’t any better - LF 7 works .Understand there is a 28 inch hard pack base beneath that groom !  See you in April at Nub’s .

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 5 chairlifts, Rope Tow and the Space Worm
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were power-tilled and tracked on Tuesday. Conditions are very good.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: It's a beautiful day to ski at Nub's Nob. The snow surface is expertly machine groomed and in mint condition. The temperature will rise to nearly 25 degrees with a light breeze which should make for a very comfortable day on skis. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with food service and an espresso bar. We are happy to host the WHOOPPEE SKI CLUB this week. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. today with an hour break at 4:30. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
